**Welcome to Picture Reference Game**
Be sure to read the task instructions to the right →
Have fun!

command.message:
Let us play a game. You are given three grids where each of them is 5 by 5 in size. Grids have empty cells and cells filled with "X". One of the grids is the target grid, you will have to guess which one!

The other player will see the same grids, but in a different order. They will describe the target grid to you. The goal is to select a grid that matches the given description.

Click on the button with the number (1, 2, 3) of the grid that the given description matches.

You will play 6 games in a row.



Take a look at what grids might look like:



Grid 1

Target grid

Let us play a game. You are given three grids where each of them is 5 by 5 in size. Grids have empty cells and cells filled with "X".

Your goal is to generate a single description that captures the main content in the grid named as "Target grid".

The other player will see the same grids (possibly in a different order) and will have to guess the target grid based on your description.

Generate the description for the given target grid. Omit any other text.

You will play 6 games in a row.



Here is an example: the first grid is the target grid and the following two grids are distractors.



Target grid
X X X X X
X
X
X
X
